changelog: Added deterministic /api/quote mode contract with explicit fallback semantics.
Documented LI.FI quote/route/status integration boundaries and failure model.
Added Yellow provider notification, auth, and persistence integration details.
Expanded whitepaper with implementation mapping tables and process diagrams.
Clarified v1 scope and explicit non-goals.
Replaced hard FHE claims with CCM pluggable interface.
Added minimal solver economic model and expanded hook security notes.
Foundational whitepaper edition, optimized as the primary onboarding read.
Preferred starting point for non-technical and early-stage technical readers.
